Description: Managing CSS in large, complex systems is challenging. Different CSS methodologies help in writing more maintainable CSS.

Topic: A Look at Some CSS Methodologies
Description: Explore various CSS methodologies to learn about best practices for structuring and organizing your CSS code.
Visit the official website of BEM (Block Element Modifier), a popular CSS methodology for writing maintainable and modular CSS.
Learn about OOCSS (Object-Oriented CSS) by visiting its official website. OOCSS promotes reusability and maintainability in CSS.
Explore the official website of SMACSS (Scalable and Modular Architecture for CSS) to understand its principles for organizing CSS.
